title: Mathematical Modeling Design Based on Science Museum Field Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Course where students enhance mathematical problem-solving abilities by performing field trip simulations through a virtual science museum platform

learning_goals: Students can convert physical phenomena in science museum exhibits into mathematical models.
Learners can design regression analysis and predictive models based on experimental data.
Participants can perform peer assessment and feedback-driven model improvements using collaborative tools.

resources: Access to Virtual Science Museum Platform

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
